mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods (gsdNum, gdsNum, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes) values (tbl_goods_seq.nextVal, #{gdsNum}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes})
